Package snek

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • snek.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class Snake
extends javafx.scene.layout.Region
    Contains definitions for Snake. How it moves and responds.

        public Snake​(int n)

      • Snake

        public Snake​(int n,
             javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane,
             double centerX,
             double centerY)
        A constructor to create a snake object, of length n, and then add it to the pane.
        Parameters:
        n - Length of the snake
        gridPane - Pane to which snake is to be added
        centerX - X co-ordinate of the snake head
        centerY - Y co-ordinate of the snake head

      • Snake

        public Snake​(int n,
             javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane,
             double centerX,
             double centerY,
             javafx.scene.image.Image ii)
        A constructor to create a snake object, of length n, and then add it to the pane. It also adds the skin of the image.
        Parameters:
        n - Length of the snake
        gridPane - Pane to which snake is to be added
        centerX - X co-ordinate of the snake head
        centerY - Y co-ordinate of the snake head
        ii - image background for snake
